title: Did you ever have urges to harm people beyond the screen due to League of Legends?
body:
I have, very many times. Particularly towards: Plats, ADCs, mobile champion abusers.

Am I the only one like this? I really am a peaceful person with no such thoughts in real life, but these people and their cancerous lifestyle on league feels like an insult to everything about the gaming community to me.

But seriously, am I the only one whose fury goes this far?

Seriously if I could've rid the world of them and got away with it, I absolutely would have. This is coming from a person with "high morals" and otherwise peaceful attitude in every aspect in life. I guess league really is one of the worst drugs to some people.

[[ I just played OFA and they had 5 Azirs; one of them was a plat ADC main who mained him, it was one of the worst experiences in my life ]]
